definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: Researchers could also work to increase the xanthohumol content of hops.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員也能增加蛇麻草中的黃腐酚含量。

sentences.english: The fluorosilicon polymers with different vinyl contents were vulcanized by using of benzyl peroxide.
sentences.chinese: 用碘量法測定的乙烯基含量與理論值相符。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a method for the determination of in Folium Cajani by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立木豆葉中牡荊苷的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: State-of-the-art systems report producing biogas that is more than 95% pure methane.
sentences.chinese: 最新系統報告產生的沼氣中甲烷的含量超過95%。

sentences.english: The proof is in the reduced-fat pudding.
sentences.chinese: 證據就是脂肪含量下降的布丁。

sentences.english: Oil content and accumulation of Acer truncatum samara were studied.
sentences.chinese: 對元寶楓翅果油脂含量和累積規律進行了研究。

sentences.english: The total lignans content of Dysosma versipellis is related to the habitat.
sentences.chinese: 商品八角蓮總木脂素含量則與產地有較大關係。

sentences.english: Pregnant mothers may also be concerned about eating fish because of the mercury content.
sentences.chinese: 準媽媽也對喫魚有顧慮，擔心其汞含量超標。

sentences.english: The content of etoposide injection was determined by first order derivative spectrophotometry.
sentences.chinese: 用一階導數光譜法測定足葉乙甙注射液的含量。

sentences.english: Reevaluate the operation task of the operators and do not cause changes to the process flow.
sentences.chinese: 重新平衡操作工的作業含量，對過程流程不引起更改。

sentences.english: The content of different form nitrogen in vegetable field is higher than wood soil.
sentences.chinese: 土壤中各種形態氮的含量菜地上壤高於林地土壤。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE: To study the compositions and contents of Amino Acids in the Fruit of Eucalyptus globulus Labill.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究藍桉果實中氨基酸的種類並測定其含量。

sentences.english: Objective To determine diosgenin content in Jingangteng soft capsule by RP-HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立金剛藤軟膠囊中薯蕷皁苷元的含量測定方法。

sentences.english: The main characteristics of the rail steel are low manganese and high carbon which content is being closed to eutectoid.
sentences.chinese: 其成分特徵是碳含量在共析點左右的高碳低錳鋼軌鋼。

sentences.english: Donkey milk also has anti-allergen properties and is just 1% fat.
sentences.chinese: 驢奶還含有抗過敏物質，而且脂肪含量僅佔1%。

sentences.english: Thus, the Se contents in oyster can be measured by Catalytic-kinetic photometry.
sentences.chinese: 應用催化動力學光度法可以測定牡蠣中硒的含量。

definition: concentration (percentage of dissolved material in a solution)/consistency/thickness/density/viscosity
